Elements.Name: ModeToggleOnL3
Elements.DisplayName: Toggle Homing / Spanner Mode on L3
Description: Allows toggling between Homing Attack / Spanner Throw modes with L3 (Light Dash) button.

Elements.Name: HomingAttackEnemies
Description:
Allows Tails to Homing Attack enemies while in Homing Attack mode.

If disabled, Tails only will Homing Attack targets without life bars, automatically using Spanners otherwise.

Elements.Name: SpannerLockOnSound
Description: Plays a Spanner sound when locking a target while in Spanner Throw mode.
